T

TcpGatherer - Class in it.polimi.se2018.networking.server
This class' task is to handle connections: it adds new clients to the server creating VirtualTcpClient that are immediately started only if a thread in threadPool is idle (otherwise is queued) to be ready to handle messages received through the socket.
TcpGatherer(ServerNetInterface, int) - Constructor for class it.polimi.se2018.networking.server.TcpGatherer
Constructor of the class.
TcpNetworkHandler - Class in it.polimi.se2018.networking.client
This class represents the server on client side.
TcpNetworkHandler(String, int) - Constructor for class it.polimi.se2018.networking.client.TcpNetworkHandler
The constructor of the class.
TcpServer - Class in it.polimi.se2018.networking.server
This class implements the server functionality to handle socket connections.

Constructor to make this server a super-server.
TcpServer(Server, int) - Constructor for class it.polimi.se2018.networking.server.TcpServer
Constructor to make this server a slave-server.
